overview_of_class: The course introduces teaching and learning strategies that aid course participants in becoming effective educators in the secondary school setting. Emphasizing current research, the course is a comprehensive study of teaching methods in the sciences: biology, chemistry, and physics. Lesson and unit planning and assessment of student learning are elements of the seminar.
name: Methods and Techniques: Science
title: SESP TEACH_ED 358-0-20 Methods and Techniques: Science
